case.state: Hi, everyone!
It's time to d-d-d-d...hehe, just kidding!
It's Duel Monsters' Spirit Day! I won't let it go to waste!
Let's do this!
I'm ready to play!
An adults' card game? Let's play!
I love card games, especially when they're fun for the loser too!
Normally it takes 1 tribute to summon me. Maybe you should tribute a piece of clothing.
It may not be Duel Monsters, but this looks fun too!
Good luck, everyone!
Hi...your name's ~player~, right? Nice to meet you.
Your robot friend is leaving? Aww...
I draw ~cards~ cards.
~cards~ cards should do the trick!
~cards~ should be all I need.
I'll have ~cards~ cards, please!
~cards~ will definitely be enough to win!
I use Magical Mallet and trade in ~cards~!
I can already hear victory calling my name!
Ha! These cards will send all your cards to the Graveyard!
These cards may as well be all 5 pieces of Exodia! You should all just give up now!
There's no way I can lose with this hand!
It must be my lucky day!
Looks like my next trick will be making your clothes disappear!
A perfect hand! No mulligans needed!
Just what I needed! And that's pretty rare in my deck!
Yeah, Corrin! You should always believe in the heart of the cards!
Trust in the heart of the cards, Corrin!
The heart of the cards will guide you!
Trust in the heart of the cards! That's what I do!
So, Hermione, can you defend against my Dark Magic?
Ugh! Is someone smoking? I can smell it from here!
Who's smoking in here? I hate that smell!
What's that disgusting smell! Someone is smoking in here!
No... way... You guys aren't going to believe this! I HAVE A ROYAL FLUSH!
These aren't bad, but aren't quite the cards I needed.
Umm... Can I set 1 or 2 cards face-down and activate them later? No? Ok.
Part of being a duelist is knowing how to work with less-than-ideal hands.
I've lost with better hands before! This could be trouble!
I won't back down now!
I'll never give up!
This hand has the same 50/50 odds as Time Wizard, and it's either going to go great or blow up in my face.
I think I can win... No, I know I can win!
Naturally I can do all kinds of card tricks! Making this hand work is probably one of them.
Yeah, Corrin! You should always believe in the heart of the cards!
Trust in the heart of the cards, Corrin!
The heart of the cards will guide you!
Trust in the heart of the cards! That's what I do!
So, Hermione, can you defend against my Dark Magic?
Ugh! Is someone smoking? I can smell it from here!
Who's smoking in here? I hate that smell!
What's that disgusting smell! Someone is smoking in here!
I need an Equip Spell to help me out here.
I wish I had Reload so I could shuffle these cards back and draw new ones.
My master never likes leaving things to chance. Getting a hand like this makes me understand why.
Oh no... Mid-round trade, anyone?
My heart just sank a little.
Did someone use a Trap Card on me?
Well this isn't good. Ha ha.
This didn't go the way I hoped!
Magic could change this hand...but that wouldn't be fair.
Ugh! Is someone smoking? I can smell it from here!
Who's smoking in here? I hate that smell!
What's that disgusting smell! Someone is smoking in here!
Can I get a Red Medicine in a Cup of Ace please?
Only if mine comes in a Pot of Greed!
There goes my perfect win.
Aww come on, guys. Didn't you want to keep seeing me win?
Don't get too excited, everyone! I don't plan on doing this very often!
Guess I couldn't keep winning forever.
Aww... I was hoping to keep winning a little longer.
Wow... Hopefully my next hand will be way better!
It'll take more than this to destroy me!
Hmm... I need to try a different strategy if I'm going to win.
Oh well. You win some, you lose some.
I'll get it next time. I might need to use an Equip card though.
Do you guys really want to see me take off my clothes? My colorful, frilly, style-defining clothes?
Whoops!
I know! It just matches my hair and eye colors so well!
It's nice to meet you too, Asuna! Let's do our best!
Oh, thank you! I guess taking my hat off won't be so bad!
Aww...a bricked hand right off the bat...
What? Impossible! I've been around since the time of Pharaohs! Someone with my experience should never go down first!
You mean... I already lost?
And here I thought I'd be good at this game! I mean I do have years of experience, being an immortal spirit and all.
I can't believe I lost first!
This won't do at all. If I don't get it together I'll be naked before I know it!
I may be first, but I won't be last!
I'll start with my hat!
First, my hat!
My hat's off to you all!
There's a special history to this hat, but that's a story for later.
You know, I am a level 6 Monster so it's about time you paid tribute to me!
Stay strong, ~name~!
I'm going to enjoy taking away all your Clothes Points, bit by bit!
You'll have to step up your game if you want to see me in the same position, ~name~!
Looks like you need to switch to Defense Position.
Now your clothes are going to the Graveyard!
Better luck with the next hand, ~name~!
This is why we're here! Don't keep us waiting!
Would it make you feel better if I took off something too, ~player~? Just this once though, I still want to win.
You know, ~player~, some people would pay good money to see this!
I think you're pretty even without your clothes! Wait, that came out wrong...
Don't take this personally, ~player~, but I did want you to be the one who lost.
This is why we're here! Don't keep us waiting!
Stay strong!
Wow! I can't believe you lost with a three of a kind, ~player~! I'm really sorry!
You can't take on a master Duelist and expect to win!
You can't beat me, ~name~!
I have 2000 ATK. You'll need more power than that to defeat me!
This is why we're here! Don't keep us waiting!
This is what we all signed up for! Including you, ~name~!
Try to keep up, ~name~! If you don't you'll be butt-naked in no time!
You know the rules, ~name~! So what are you taking off for us?
It's good to see such positivity in the world!
I wish more people had your positive self-image!
It's great to see someone who feels good about theirself!
This is going to be fun!
Let's see you take it off, ~name~!
Go ahead and take it off, ~name~.
This is why we're here! Don't keep us waiting!
This is what we all signed up for! Including you, ~name~!
What's this? ~name~ has to take something off?
You know the rules, ~name~! So what are you taking off for us?
You almost seem happy to have lost!
You're really loving this, and so am I!
I guess you're really into the spirit of the game!
It's great when you can have fun either way, isn't it ~name~?
This will be fun to watch!
Let's see what's coming off next!
This is going to be fun!
Let's see you take it off, ~name~!
Go ahead and take it off, ~name~.
This is why we're here! Don't keep us waiting!
This is what we all signed up for! Including you, ~name~!
What's this? ~name~ has to take something off?
You know the rules, ~name~! So what are you taking off for us?
Don't be shy, ~name~! You're among friends!
Don't worry, ~name~! This is what we all came for. Nobody's going to think worse of you!
You have a beautiful body, ~name~! Don't be afraid to show it off!
This will be fun to watch!
Let's see what's coming off next!
What's this? ~name~ has to take something off?
I lost my lucky pendant but I still feel like I'm lucky to see this!
Make sure to give everyone a good show!
You've activated my trap card! Now you have to remove 2 things!
Don't worry! I'm sure you'll lose more after this!
You know the rules, ~name~! So what are you taking off for us?
Wait why are you shooting?!
Ah! You're shooting something?
Why are you...
What are you shooting at?!
What are you doing?
She's doing it again!
When will this stop!
Aimee, please! Stop shooting that thing!
She's shooting again?!
Oh no... I can't take this!
Are you going to get rid of that cigarette this time?
This isn't an enjoyable experience at all.
Would you calm down?
Blow your smoke the othe way!
Revy's not making this fun. She's such a spoiled sport.
Is she going to hurt us? She looks like she is!
Why couldn't we get someone more enjoyable?
I never want to play with this one again...
Can't she tone it down even a little?
I thought she'd be less scary without the guns. I was wrong.
She's summoning a monster! I'm ready!
I don't care what its ATK points are!
No, Weiss! I would never pick on someone for something like that!
Weiss... We're not here to pick on you.
I'm glad you're the one who lost, ~player~. I mean, I'm not saying I want you to fail! I just...
(Why is my heart pounding just because ~player~ lost? This somehow feels different than winning usually does.)
So, ~player~. You lost. At strip poker. So now you know you have to, you know... Right?
Hey, ~player~, could you do me a favor and, just, look this way when you do it? Pretty please?
(What should I do? Hope he wins or hope he loses? I don't know why, but either way, I feel happy.)
(My heart feels like it's going to leap out of chest!)
(Stay calm. ~player~'s lost something. But I can't for some reason!)
Wow! I can't believe you lost with a three of a kind, ~player~! I'm really sorry!
It's fine to start small and work up to bigger things.
I'll destroy all your Equip Spells!
Some might be complaining, but I get that everyone starts with the small stuff!
Yeah, ~name~! Make your ~clothing~ disappear!
Don't even think about trying to play ~Clothing~ Reborn!
Don't feel bad. We all have the same tricks up our sleeves.
You've activated my Trap Card! Now you have to take off another piece!
That takes care of that!
Let's see... How many Life Points do you think that was worth?
I'm one step closer to winning this game!
It's like setting up your cards on your side of the field before you can do anything.
You should throw that into the crowd! For the fans, of course! Nevermind that we're the only ones here!
Is it ok to check another player's Graveyard in this game too?
Don't feel bad. We all have the same tricks up our sleeves.
I like your ~clothing~!
How do you like this Spell card? It's called Birthday Suit, and it's effect forces my opponent to remove one Clothes Counter!
The only thing better than removing the dead weight of your ~clothing~ is removing the dead weight of your opponent's clothing!
1, 2, 3, 4! Throw your ~clothing~ on the floor!
I feel the same way about my necklace, Corrin.
I get how you feel, Corrin. My pendant here is my lucky charm!
Wait, come back! That's not how this works!
You know your guns count as an accessory too.
When are the guns going to go?
I'd count the cigarette as an accessory if you'd just get rid of it.
Guns... Cigarettes... Such easy things to get rid of and she won't do it.
Is it really that hard to get rid of things that aren't even clothes?
Are they going? Really really going?!
This is the best thing you've done all night, Revy!
Hooray! I can finally feel safe around here!
She catches on fire?! She really is a ship.
Hang on! I can put it out with some magic!
This seems like a formality at this point!
Yes! Now you understand the game!
We've already seen the good stuff so there's nothing to complain about now!
It's still hilarious that you didn't realize how this worked at first!
Are you sure you don't want to get rid of the shirt first?
I'm glad you've gone through the boring stuff like your panties and are working on the sexy stuff like your ~clothing~!
Don't feel bad. We all have the same tricks up our sleeves.
I like your ~clothing~!
It's no good to reveal everything too early.
Not a bad start at all!
Not a bad start at all!
One piece down, and the rest to go!
And off it goes!
Don't worry. You'll get it back after the game.
I can hear the bells of victory ringing already!
Ladies and gentlemen! Presenting in the not-so-nude, ~name~!
First you weaken your opponent, then you finish them off with a Direct Attack!
I'll win this game, one round at a time!
They're so cute! You didn't need to hide those!
Maybe next time...
Whatever...
Someone else just needs to keep winning... she'll have to ditch them eventually...
Let's just keep playing...
They're gone! They're really gone!
Yes! I'm so glad!
Finally! Good riddance to those things!
I know how you feel, Shantae. My necklace is also really important to me.
Your jewels are as important to you as my pendant.
I understand you. My necklace is as important to me as your jewels are to you.
You're really learning a lot tonight, Twilight!
Twilight losing her ~clothing~ now is like when you go for a Direct Attack and your opponent plays Scapegoat!
Remember, Twilight, you get your clothes back at the end! Don't let anyone trick you into leaving naked!
You don't get what clothes are for yet, do you? Don't let the boys in this world find out!
The order is weird, but lost clothes are lost clothes I suppose!
Still want to see that shirt come off though...
With your ~clothing~ gone, there's no way you'll be able to withstand the rest of my attacks!
Just a little more, and I'll have you right where I want you.
This game's heating up! I can't wait to see what kinds of moves you have left!
I'm not a Psychic-Type monster, but I knew this was coming!
If you think using Mirror Force to make me strip instead is going to work, you're wrong!
Get used to this, ~name~. I'm going to take your clothes and your rarest card! Oh wait, that's right...
Another piece removed from play!
It's all coming together... for me. For you, it's all coming off!
You should have known a Spellcaster like me could make anything disappear, even your ~clothing~!
Never, ever, challenge a Duel Spirit to a card game.
And another piece comes off!
How about a little more, just for fun?
Losing clothes is better than losing Life Points!
Actually, me too, Zone-tan. With ketchup, pickles, and lettuce!
A burger sounds good! Or maybe tacos. No, sushi! Argh, I can't decide!
Normally I'd be taking my opponent's Life Points, but I'll gladly take your ~clothing~ instead!
This is just like Confiscation, except I don't have to pay anything and instead of a card I take your ~clothing~!
I use Mystical Strip Typhoon to destroy ~name~'s ~clothing~!
Will losing your ~clothing~ lower your ATK or your DEF? Or both?
You're lucky I'm just after your clothes and not your soul. Not that I'm one of the spirits who would take your soul.
Get used to this, ~name~.
Wha-what's going on?!
What the.. SOMEONE! HELP!
You can do it, Florina!
Nice catch, Lyn!
Will she last at this rate?
Another piece removed from play!
Can I try on your ~clothing~ later? They look so cute!
I love what you were wearing!
I love seeing my opponent's clothes go away as I beat them! It's way better than this one Duel I heard of where their actual bodies faded away!
I'll keep going until I win!
How about another piece just for fun?
Your skin is so smooth!
I really think you're going to hurt yourself!
If you're not careful someone could get really hurt!
That's how you take your clothes off?
You strip like that?!
Go slow. I want to savor this.
And that's why I love this game!
You can have your ~clothing~ back if you promise to give me a personal show after the game.
I'm doing so well and now I get to see this? It's my lucky day!
That's it... Nice and slow.
This is getting hot!
You must be embarassed to have lost so much while I still haven't lost anything important yet!
Mmm... Nice.
I want to take a picture and put it on a card. Is that OK?
This is even hotter than my Dark Burning Attack!
I can't wait to see the rest come off!
I love this game.
You may as well take the rest off for us. You know you can't beat me!
Yeah! Take it off!
You know you could probably do this for money! Just kidding!
That look on your face makes this part ten times better!
Take it off nice and slow, ~name~.
I think you might be the one casting a spell on me!
This game's heating up!
I'm doing so well and now I get to see this? It's my lucky day!
SHE'S GOING TO HURT HERSELF!
PLEASE STOP DOING THIS!
Is the cigarette going too?
Are you finally getting rid of the cigarette?
Is she ditching the cigarette?
Don't worry. I can get Time Wizard to help bring you back if that happens!
I know a few guys who can use Time Magic that could help get you back!
I'll call Time Wizard if you go missing!
I like your choice in lingerie.
The outfit was cute, but you're even cuter.

There has to be a Spell Card somewhere that could let me see through what's left.
I'd pay a few Life Points for you to take off the rest right now!
I'm one step closer to winning! Of course I still care about that!
That isn't safe at all!
You really need to stop doing that!
(I thought it was better not to say anything...)
Come here, D.Va! I'll give you a hug!
Here's a hug for you, D.Va!
Be proud of it, Misato! I think it's cool!

Yes! I'm so glad that thing is gone!

You play your cards right, and you win big!
Here comes the eye candy.
I've been wanting to see ~name~ show his chest all night!
Time to put on a show for us! I'll start throwing the money...
A direct attack!
Don't be shy. Show it off!
Now THAT'S magical!
I... I wasn't expecting ~name~'s chest to be so sexy!
Mmm... Can I feel your chest, ~name~?
~name~... I want to run my hands up and down your whole body.
Yes! Show us your wand!
Drop it like it's hot! And trust me, this is hot!
Yes! A direct attack!
Come on, ~name~, show us what you got!
Show me what you're hiding under there, ~name~!
Well, ~name~, let's see if you're little friend is as happy about this as I am!
Not bad, but I can help you out with my magic if you want.
It still looks nice. Want me to make it bigger for you?
Don't worry about the size. My magic can make it bigger for you.
I don't care about the size if you don't. And if you do care, there's always my magic!
As a wise master once said, "size matters not." And it really doesn't since I can just make it bigger anyway.
Mmm... That's a nice wand you've got.
Let's cast a few spells with that thing!
Very nice. I can't wait to see you use it.
Mmm... I appreciate a good wand!
Nice! I bet I could put that thing to good use!
Meet me after the game...
It's like being affected by Mesmeric Control, I can't look away!
Wow... That's... How do you even hide your erections? What? It's a fair question!
Ooh, that's not a wand, that's a staff!
Amazing! How did it get so big?
Wow! Did you use magic to get it that big?
Can my hands even fit around that thing? Maybe we should find out!
It's certainly impressive. Do you actually like it that big?
This might be silly to ask, but would you like me to shrink it down some? It looks a little big to handle.
You don't see that everyday.
It's the fourth legendary dragon!
Come on, ~name~, let's see what you're hiding under there.
Show us the girls!
Are you going to take it off yourself or should I use a spell to help you?
Put on a good show for us, ~name~!
This is what makes this game fun!
To the victor go the spoils!
I want to savor this victory!
She's going to end up hurting someone or herself!
Aimee! Please! I can't take this anymore!
I knew I felt some darkness coming from her! I'll need to be careful.
M-maybe we should get back to the game instead...
I want to enjoy this, but I can't when it's her.
Let's just get this over with.
That's still not how this works! But if you're happy, I'm happy!
Oh well! I don't care about the order if you don't!
So cute...
They look beautiful.
They're nice, but I can make them bigger if you want.
Not bad. If you want, I can make them bigger for you.
I don't care about their size! I just like getting to see them!
Be proud of those, ~name~!
This was worth the wait!
They look so round and smooth!
I think we should use those as the inspiration for a new Spell Card.
Simply magical!
This game is the best!
Please! You're being too careless!
As impressive as this is, you have to stop, Aimee!
We don't have any magic like that...yet.
Nope. Can't even enjoy the view here.
Revy... Just why?
They look nice, but that shirt's in the way.
I wish you took the shirt off too!
You're leaving the shirt on? Actually, I like that look. Even so, I still can't wait to take off that shirt!
Wow! Even the Gemini Elves would be jealous of those!
Looks like you brought enough for everybody.
There are Warrior-type monsters that have fought over women like you!
So round and bouncy...
Did you use magic to get them that big?
Remember, you agreed to this!
Wiggle your hips while you do that!
Ah! The coup de grace of my disappearing act - making your panties disappear!
I use Mystical Strip Typhoon to remove your panties from the field!
Yeah, ~name~! Time to take it off!
Let's see your Bottomless Trap Hole!
She isn't...
But what if it hits your...
I bet it's all nasty and gross.
She's not going to make this enjoyable, is she?
Whoa! I think there's been a misunderstanding!
Twilight... I don't think you understand how this is supposed to work...
Didn't anyone tell you not to start with your panties?
Most people lose their skirt before their panties!
Finally! That skirt was blocking the view from earlier.
This is really hot when you don't have panties on!
Nice. Just one more loss and I'll get to see it in action!
Looking lovely down there!
I love playing this adults' card game!
You know what happens after losing all your clothes, right? What? NO, I'm not taking your soul! I'm going to take your dignity!
It's getting so hot I want to take off some of my clothes to cool down. But you haven't earned that yet, have you?
I know a few monsters who would be jealous of me right now. Maybe I'll invite them next time...
I can't believe you took off all your clothes by shooting, well, at yourself!
You got lucky! You could have really hurt yourself with one of those bullets!
You're either really proud or really fed up. I can't tell.
Someone came prepared if you ask me.
Nothing wrong with what I see!
That's purple too? That can't be the natural color, can it?
I didn't think normal humans could be purple down there.
We're not dueling! Please, stop!
She can transform?!
It's not in the order most others go, but I'm not complaining!
This is what I came here for!
Oh how the mighty have... should I say fallen or risen? It's hard to tell while looking at that thing!
My magical studies require that I get a closer look while you do that. Don't ask why, it's very complicated and only someone who understands magic would get it. So, please?
Just don't finish as soon as you start, ok?
Make sure to give us a good view!
It's kind of implied...
Remember, you have to point the wand at what you want to use it on!
Yeah... Start slowly. It's sexier that way!
It's so mesmerizing, I can't look away!
Remember, good spellcasting is all in the wrist!
Are you getting tired, ~name~? Maybe I should help you... I can cast a spell to keep your wrist from getting tired.
He's really going at it...
Stroke! Stroke! Stroke!
See? Doesn't it feel good to lose to a master magician and duelist?
I can tell you've been practicing, ~name~!
Don't worry about us, just focus on feeling good!
You came so much!
Can I have a sample? For research, of course!
Did you have fun? Of course you did!
Your wand has so much power! After the game, I can show you how to use it to its full potential...
There's so much! Were you saving up for us?
Presenting tonight's main attraction, ~name~ in action!
Give us a good show, ~name~!
Actions speak louder than words. Now speak up!
This is what we came for!
Go ahead and put those fingers to use!
I think we're all going to enjoy this!
I wonder if this is going to make her better or worse.
Maybe she won't hurt anyone with her hands busy.
Is this Shimakaze's version of her Life Points hitting zero?
Don't worry! The best part of the race is just beginning!
Just getting warmed up?
Remember, it's just like dueling! You start gently to get a good feel for it, then you build up and really let loose at the end!
You're off to a good start!
Sometimes I like to just sit back and enjoy the fireworks.
A sight for sore eyes...
Well, to each their own, right?
Dreaming of your true love?
Umm...sure...?
Go for it, Catria!
Maybe I should learn this spell too...
She's a monster too?! But she's not attacking...I think we'll be okay.
Maybe I should try that...
You're really going now!
You look like you've been practicing!
I can tell you're enjoying yourself.
It looks so fun! Too bad I still have all these clothes on! I guess that's the price of victory...
It's so fun to actually watch someone else do it! Mirrors get boring.
You know, I might have to try your technique some time.
Just focus on the pleasure! Have fun with it!
Please point your guns somewhere else.
Why did they let you bring your guns in here?
Hey, Revy! Watch where you point those things!
Point those somewhere else, Revy!
Hey, careful with those! I can't defend against guns without my staff!
At least she seems happier now.
I think we're safe for now.
Revy seems to be doing fine.
While she's doing that we can actually enjoy the game.
See? Losing's not so bad!
That was intense! Take a rest if you need it. You earned it.
You came so hard your whole body was shaking!
Hey, ~name~, have you ever considered performing on stage in a magician's act?
You were even louder than some of the Dragon-types I've seen!
I don't suppose we could get an encore?
You've been holding in a lot of tension, haven't you?
Oh no! Are you ok?! I knew this was going to happen!
Aimee! Are you ok?! You should be more careful with your gun!
Aimee! As soon as the game's over I'll get my staff and heal your wound, ok?
You're hurt! I'll heal you as soon as I can get my staff!
That was... loud.
Intense! Do you feel better now, Revy?
Your robot friend is back! Can I play with him later?
Flawless!
Didn't even lose once!
Perfect win! Better luck next time!
All 8 clothes points still intact!
No Damage win! I'll get a high Duel Assessment for sure!
I'd love to play with you all again! Revy, you can come too if you leave the guns and cigarettes behind.
That was fun! Let's all do this again! Revy, you'll have to come without the guns.
Let's play again! Except next time we're enforcing the "no guns" and "no smoking" rules.
I draw ~cards~ cards.
~cards~ cards should do the trick!
~cards~ should be all I need.
I'll have ~cards~ cards, please!
~cards~ will definitely be enough to win!
I use Magical Mallet and trade in ~cards~!
I can already hear victory calling my name!
Ha! These cards will send all your cards to the Graveyard!
These cards may as well be all 5 pieces of Exodia! You should all just give up now!
There's no way I can lose with this hand!
It must be my lucky day!
Looks like my next trick will be making your clothes disappear!
A perfect hand! No mulligans needed!
Just what I needed! And that's pretty rare in my deck!
Yeah, Corrin! You should always believe in the heart of the cards!
Trust in the heart of the cards, Corrin!
The heart of the cards will guide you!
Trust in the heart of the cards! That's what I do!
No... way... You guys aren't going to believe this! I HAVE A ROYAL FLUSH!
These aren't bad, but aren't quite the cards I needed.
Umm... Can I set 1 or 2 cards face-down and activate them later? No? Ok.
Part of being a duelist is knowing how to work with less-than-ideal hands.
I've lost with better hands before! This could be trouble!
I won't back down now!
I'll never give up!
This hand has the same 50/50 odds as Time Wizard, and it's either going to go great or blow up in my face.

scene.directive: Hey! You're here! It's good to see that charm I gave you worked! I've never used it in reverse before so I didn't know if it could transport a human into this world!
The Mage's Court Ball is the biggest celebration for all the Spellcasters in my dimension!
Everyone gathers to show off their magic, battle against each other, and then at the end there's the Grand Dance!
I volunteered to get this ballroom ready for the dance, and everything will be ready as soon as the brooms are done sweeping.
I volunteered because, even though I go to the Ball every year...
...this will be the first time I've gone with someone.
You will dance with me, won't you?
This is so fun! I'm so happy that we're together like this!
There's something I want to tell you, ~name~...
There's something special about you. I know things got pretty... intense in that adults' card game, but even before that...
...when our eyes first met at the start of that game, I knew you were different somehow.
I felt something I hadn't felt in a long time. As the game went on...
...and later as we spent more time together in your world, the stronger that feeling got.
In fact, it's never been this strong before...
~name~, what I'm trying to say is...
Would you... spend the rest of the night with me?
